title: Ticket #4442: Enable PR_SET_CHILD_SUBREAPER in the starter if available
description:
prctl(PR_SET_CHILD_SUBREAPER, ...) instructs the kernel to re-parent all child (and all subsequent children) processes to the current one instead of to init.

This should greatly help the procd determine process trees (even in the lack of things like PID namespaces or cgroups) if processes are unable to re-parent to init.
